title: MD
biography: Valery Ivanovich Shumakov was a Russian surgeon and transplantologist, famous for being the founding father of organ transplants in Russia and was a pioneer of artificial organ surgery.
aiSummary: Valery Shumakov is a transplant surgery specialist with an H-index of 5 at Shumakov National Medical Research Center (Member). Has been published in Doklady biological sciences : proceedings of the Academy of Sciences of the USSR, Biological sciences sections. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
